properties.name: articleId
properties.description: The ID of the Hacker News article to be returned

properties.name: username
properties.description: The Hacker News user to be returned

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Whether to include all the comments in a Hacker News article

properties.name: tags
properties.description: Returns query results filtered by Ask HN tag

properties.name: Comment
properties.description: Returns query results filtered by comment tag

properties.name: Front Page
properties.description: Returns query results filtered by Front Page tag

properties.name: Poll
properties.description: Returns query results filtered by poll tag

properties.name: Show HN
properties.description: Returns query results filtered by Show HN tag

properties.name: Story
properties.description: Returns query results filtered by story tag
